text.div:
HSPC Practice Affiliation Type

A set of codes that describe how a provider is affiliated with an organization pertaining to the practice of medicine.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/practitioner-hspc-practiceAffiliationType defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
5b595190-aceb-48de-b0d6-8950a8829183 School affiliation The provider's connection with the organization as a practitioner is in an educaitonal manner, i.e. as an educator or student.

name: HSPC Practice Affiliation Type
description: A set of codes that describe how a provider is affiliated with an organization pertaining to the practice of medicine.

concept.definition: The provider's connection with the organization as a practitioner is in an educaitonal manner, i.e. as an educator or student.
